reviews.review_msg: John Calvert has no authority, he sat at the center of the room, and spoke in a monotone voice. For the final group project, we went to him for feedback, he insisted that we were doing everything correctly, but with the final grade I got, I couldn't have gotten more than 60% on the project. His lectures had 300 students, but only 30 would attend.

This class was SO EASY!!! John is such a sweet guy, the class legit only has 2 ONLINE quizzes, no midterms or final exams! There is a video group project which was a piece of cake! The lectures were long but the material was very interesting and John was sympathetic with us being that it was a night lecture and almost always let us go early!
